1001.name: Boots of Speed
1001.description:
Limited to 1.

UNIQUE Passive - Enhanced Movement: +25 Movement Speed

(Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)

1039.name: Hunter's Machete
1039.description:
UNIQUE Passive - Maim: Basic attacks deal 10 bonus magic damage to monsters on hit.
UNIQUE Passive - Butcher: Damage dealt to monsters increased by 10%.

(Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)
1039.plaintext: Slightly increases damage dealt to neutral monsters

1054.name: Doran's Shield
1054.description:
+100 Health
+10 Health Regen per 5 seconds

UNIQUE Passive: Blocks 8 damage from champion basic attacks.

1055.name: Doran's Blade
1055.description:
+80 Health
+10 Attack Damage

Passive: Basic attacks restore 5 Health on hit.

1056.name: Doran's Ring
1056.description:
+60 Health
+15 Ability Power
+@FlatMPRegenMod*5@ Mana Regen per 5 seconds

Passive: Restores 4 Mana upon killing a unit.

2003.name: Health Potion
2003.description:
Limited to 5 at one time.

Click to Consume: Restores 150 Health over 15 seconds.
2003.plaintext: Consume to restore Health over time

2009.name: Total Biscuit of Rejuvenation
2009.description: <consumable>Click to Consume:</consumable> Restores 80 Health and 50 Mana over 10 seconds.

2043.name: Vision Ward
2043.description:
Click to Consume: Places an invisible ward that reveals the surrounding area and invisible units in the area for 3 minutes.

(Revealing a ward in this manner grants a portion of the gold reward when that unit is killed.)
2043.plaintext: Use to temporarily provide vision and stealth detection in an area

2045.name: Ruby Sightstone
2045.description:
+360 Health

UNIQUE Passive - Ward Refresh: Holds 5 charges and refills upon visiting the shop.
UNIQUE Active - Ghost Ward: Consumes a charge to place an invisible ward that reveals the surrounding area for 3 minutes (maximum 3 wards placed from this item at once).

(Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)
2045.plaintext: Greatly increases Health and provides Sight Wards over time

2047.name: Oracle's Extract
2047.description: <consumable>Click to Consume:</consumable> Grants detection of nearby invisible units for up to 5 minutes or until death.
2047.plaintext: Allows champion to see invisible units

2049.name: Sightstone
2049.description:
+180 Health

UNIQUE Passive - Ward Refresh: Holds 4 charges and refills upon visiting the shop.
UNIQUE Active - Ghost Ward: Consumes a charge to place an invisible ward that reveals the surrounding area for 3 minutes (maximum 2 wards placed from this item at once).

(Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)
2049.plaintext: Increases Health and provides Sight Wards over time

2050.name: Explorer's Ward
2050.description: <consumable>Click to Consume:</consumable> Places an invisible ward that reveals the surrounding area for 60 seconds.

2051.name: Guardian's Horn
2051.description:
+200 Health
+@FlatHPRegenMod*5@ Health Regen per 5 seconds

UNIQUE Passive: Enemy spellcasts reduce the cooldown of Battle Cry by 1 second.
UNIQUE Active - Battle Cry: Gain 30% movement speed, 20 Armor, and 20 Magic Resistance for 3 seconds. 25 second cooldown.
2051.plaintext: Activate for Movement Speed and a defensive boost

2052.name: Poro-Snax
2052.description:
This savory blend of free-range, grass-fed Avarosan game hens and organic, non-ZMO Freljordian herbs contains the essential nutrients necessary to keep your Poro purring with pleasure.

All proceeds will be donated towards fighting Noxian animal cruelty.

3001.name: Abyssal Scepter
3001.description:
+60 Ability Power
+60 Magic Resist

UNIQUE Aura: Reduces the Magic Resist of nearby enemies by 20.
3001.plaintext: Reduces Magic Resist of nearby enemies

+250 Mana
+80 Ability Power
+@FlatMPRegenMod*5@ Mana Regen per 5 seconds

UNIQUE Passive - Insight: Grants Ability Power equal to 3% of maximum Mana.
UNIQUE Passive - Mana Charge: Grants +8 maximum Mana (max +750 Mana) for each spell cast and Mana expenditure (occurs up to 2 times every 8 seconds). Transforms into Seraph's Embrace at +750 Mana.

(Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)
3003.plaintext: Increases Ability Power based on maximum Mana

3004.name: Manamune
3004.description:
+250 Mana
+20 Attack Damage
+7 Mana Regen per 5 seconds

UNIQUE Passive - Awe: Grants bonus Attack Damage equal to 2% of maximum Mana.
UNIQUE Passive - Mana Charge: Grants +4 maximum Mana (max +750 Mana) for each basic attack, spell cast, and Mana expenditure (occurs up to 2 times every 8 seconds).

Transforms into Muramana at +750 Mana.

(Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)
3004.plaintext: Increases Attack Damage based on maximum Mana

3135.name: Void Staff
3135.description:
+80 Ability Power

UNIQUE Passive: Magic damage ignores 35% of the target's Magic Resist (applies before Magic Penetration).

3136.name: Haunting Guise
3136.description:
+25 Ability Power
+200 Health

UNIQUE Passive - Eyes of Pain: +15 Magic Penetration

(Magic Penetration: Magic damage is increased by ignoring an amount of the target's Magic Resist equal to Magic Penetration.)

(Unique Passives with the same name do not stack.)

3139.name: Mercurial Scimitar
3139.description:
+60 Attack Damage
+45 Magic Resist

UNIQUE Active - Quicksilver: Removes all debuffs, and if champion is melee, also grants +50% bonus Movement Speed for 1 second (90 second cooldown).
3139.plaintext: Activate to remove all debuffs and grant massive Movement Speed

3140.name: Quicksilver Sash
3140.description:
+30 Magic Resist

UNIQUE Active - Quicksilver: Removes all debuffs (90 second cooldown).

3142.name: Youmuu's Ghostblade
3142.description:
+65 Attack Damage
+@FlatCritChanceMod*100@% Critical Strike Chance
+10% Cooldown Reduction

UNIQUE Passive: +20 Armor Penetration
UNIQUE Active: Grants +20% Movement Speed and +40% Attack Speed (lasts 6 seconds for melee champions, 4 seconds for ranged champions) (45 second cooldown).

(Armor Penetration: Physical damage is increased by ignoring an amount of the target's Armor equal to Armor Penetration.)
3142.plaintext: Activate to greatly increase Movement Speed and Attack Speed

3143.name: Randuin's Omen
3143.description:
+500 Health
+60 Armor

UNIQUE Passive - Cold Steel: When hit by basic attacks, reduces the attacker's Attack Speed by 15% and Movement Speed by 10% for 1 seconds.
UNIQUE Active: Slows the Movement Speed of nearby enemy units by 35% for 2 seconds (+1 second per 200 Armor and +1 second per 200 Magic Resist) (60 second cooldown).

(Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)
3143.plaintext: Greatly increases defenses, activate to slow nearby enemies

3144.name: Bilgewater Cutlass
3144.description:
+25 Attack Damage
+12% Life Steal

UNIQUE Active: Deals 100 magic damage and slows the target champion's Movement Speed by 25% for 2 seconds (90 second cooldown).
3144.plaintext: Activate to deal magic damage and slow target champion

3145.name: Hextech Revolver
3145.description:
+40 Ability Power

UNIQUE Passive: +0% Spell Vamp

(Spell Vamp: Abilities heal for a percentage of the damage they deal. Area of Effect spells only grant one-third of the healing from Spell Vamp.)
3145.plaintext: Increases Spell Vamp and Ability Power

3146.name: Hextech Gunblade
3146.description:
+40 Attack Damage
+80 Ability Power
+@PercentLifeStealMod*100@% Life Steal

UNIQUE Passive: +15% Spell Vamp
UNIQUE Passive: Basic attacks (on hit) and single-target spells against champions reduce the cooldown of this item by 3 seconds.
UNIQUE Active: Deals 150 (+40% of Ability Power) magic damage and slows the target champion's Movement Speed by 40% for 2 seconds (60 second cooldown).

(Spell Vamp: Abilities heal for a percentage of the damage they deal. Area of Effect spells only grant one-third of the healing from Spell Vamp.)
3146.plaintext: Increases Attack Damage and Ability Power, activate to slow a target

3151.name: Liandry's Torment
3151.description:
+50 Ability Power
+300 Health

UNIQUE Passive - Eyes of Pain: +15 Magic Penetration
UNIQUE Passive: Dealing spell damage applies a damage-over-time effect for 3 seconds that deals bonus magic damage equal to 2% of the target's current Health per second. This bonus damage is doubled against movement-impaired units and capped at 100 damage per second vs. monsters.

(A unit is movement-impaired if it is slowed, stunned, taunted, feared, or immobilized.)

(Magic Penetration: Magic damage is increased by ignoring an amount of the target's Magic Resist equal to Magic Penetration.)

(Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)
3151.plaintext: Spell damage burns enemies for a portion of their Health

3152.name: Will of the Ancients
3152.description:
+50 Ability Power

UNIQUE Aura: Grants nearby allied champions +30 Ability Power and +20% Spell Vamp.

(Spell Vamp: Abilities heal for a percentage of the damage they deal. Area of Effect spells only grant one-third of the healing from Spell Vamp.)
3152.plaintext: Grants Spell Vamp and Ability Power to nearby allies

3153.name: Blade of the Ruined King
3153.description:
+25 Attack Damage
+40% Attack Speed
+15% Life Steal

UNIQUE Passive: Basic attacks deal 5% of the target's current Health in bonus physical damage (max 60 vs. monsters and minions) on hit.
UNIQUE Active: Deals 15% of target champion's maximum Health (min. 100) as physical damage, heals for the same amount, and steals 30% of the target's Movement Speed for 3 seconds (90 second cooldown).
3153.plaintext: Deals damage based on target's Health, can steal Health and Movement Speed

3155.name: Hexdrinker
3155.description:
+25 Attack Damage
+25 Magic Resist

UNIQUE Passive - Lifeline: Upon taking magic damage that would reduce Health below 30%, grants a shield that absorbs 250 magic damage for 5 seconds (90 second cooldown).

(Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)
3155.plaintext: Increases Attack Damage and Magic Resist

3156.plaintext: Grants bonus Attack Damage when Health is low

3157.name: Zhonya's Hourglass
3157.description:
+70 Ability Power
+45 Armor

UNIQUE Active - Stasis: Champion becomes invulnerable and untargetable for 2.5 seconds, but is unable to move, attack, cast spells, or use items during this time (90 second cooldown).
3157.plaintext: Activate to become invincible but unable to take actions

3158.name: Ionian Boots of Lucidity
3158.description:
UNIQUE Passive: +15% Cooldown Reduction
UNIQUE Passive - Enhanced Movement: +45 Movement Speed

(Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)

''This item is dedicated in honor of Ionia's victory over Noxus in the Rematch for the Southern Provinces on 10 December, 20 CLE.''
3158.plaintext: Increases Movement Speed and Cooldown Reduction

3165.name: Morellonomicon
3165.description:
+75 Ability Power
+12 Mana Regen per 5 seconds
+20% Cooldown Reduction

UNIQUE Passive: Dealing magic damage to enemy champions below 40% Health inflicts Grievous Wounds for 4 seconds.

(Grievous Wounds reduces incoming healing and regeneration effects by 50%.)
3165.plaintext: Greatly increases Ability Power and Cooldown Reduction

3170.name: Moonflair Spellblade (Ranged Only)
3170.description:
+50 Ability Power
+50 Armor
+50 Magic Resistance

UNIQUE Passive - Tenacity: Reduces the duration of stuns, slows, taunts, fears, silences, blinds, and immobilizes by 35%.

(Unique Passives with the same name do not stack.)
3170.plaintext: Improves defense and reduces duration of disabling effects

3174.name: Athene's Unholy Grail
3174.description:
+60 Ability Power
+40 Magic Resist
+15 Mana Regen per 5 seconds
+20% Cooldown Reduction

UNIQUE Passive: Restores 12% of maximum Mana on kill or assist.
UNIQUE Passive - Mana Font: Increases Mana Regen by 1% for every 1% of missing Mana.

(Unique Passives with the same name do not stack.)
3174.plaintext: Restores maximum Mana on kill or assist

3181.name: Sanguine Blade
3181.description:
+50 Attack Damage
+15% Life Steal

UNIQUE Passive: Basic attacks grant +6 Attack Damage and +1% Life Steal for 4 seconds on hit (effect stacks up to 5 times).
3181.plaintext: Greatly increases Attack Damage and Life Steal

3184.name: Entropy
3184.description:
+275 Health
+70 Attack Damage

UNIQUE Passive - Rage: Basic attacks grant 20 Movement Speed for 2 seconds on hit. Kills grant 60 Movement Speed for 2 seconds.
UNIQUE Active: For the next 5 seconds, basic attacks reduce the target's Movement Speed by 30% and deal 80 true damage over 2.5 seconds on hit (60 second cooldown).

(Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)
3184.plaintext: Attacks and kills give a small burst of speed, activate to slow enemies

3185.name: The Lightbringer
3185.description:
+50 Attack Damage
+20 Armor
+12% Life Steal

UNIQUE Passive - Vanquish: Basic attacks have a 20% chance to deal 100 bonus magic damage on hit (damage doubled for non-champions).
UNIQUE Passive - Trap Detection: Nearby stealthed enemy traps are revealed.
UNIQUE Active: A stealth-detecting mist grants vision in the target area for 10 seconds (60 second cooldown).

(Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)
3185.plaintext: Increases Attack Speed and grants vision of attacked enemies

3187.name: Hextech Sweeper
3187.description:
+50 Ability Power
+300 Health

UNIQUE Passive: +10% Cooldown Reduction
UNIQUE Passive: +10% Movement Speed
UNIQUE Passive: - Trap Detection Nearby stealthed enemy traps are revealed.
UNIQUE Active: A stealth-detecting mist grants vision in the target area for 10 seconds (60 second cooldown).
3187.plaintext: Activate to reveal a nearby area of the map

3190.name: Locket of the Iron Solari
3190.description:
+300 Health
+20 Armor
+10% Cooldown Reduction

UNIQUE Active: Grants a shield to nearby allies for 5 seconds that absorbs up to 50 (+10 per level) damage (60 second cooldown).
UNIQUE Aura - Legion: Grants nearby allies +20 Magic Resist and +10 Health Regen per 5 seconds.

(Unique Auras with the same name don't stack.)
3190.plaintext: Activate to shield nearby allies from damage

3191.name: Seeker's Armguard
3191.description:
+30 Armor
+20 Ability Power

UNIQUE Passive: Killing a unit grants 0.5 bonus Armor and Ability Power. This bonus stacks up to 30 times.

3196.name: Augment: Power
3196.description:
+3 Ability Power per level
+@FlatHPPoolMod@ Health
+@FlatHPRegenMod*5@ Health Regen per 5 seconds

Ability Augment: Power Transfer increases Viktor's Movement Speed by 30% for 3 seconds.
3196.plaintext: Improves Viktor's Power Transfer and increases Health

3197.name: Augment: Gravity
3197.description:
+3 Ability Power per level
+@FlatMPPoolMod@ Mana
+10% Cooldown Reduction
+@FlatMPRegenMod*5@ Mana Regen per 5 seconds

Ability Augment: Gravity Field has an additional 30% cast range.
3197.plaintext: Improves Viktor's Gravity Field and increases Cooldown Reduction

3198.name: Augment: Death
3198.description:
+3 Ability Power per level
+45 Ability Power

Ability Augment: Death Ray sets fire to enemies, dealing 30% additional magic damage over 4 seconds.
3198.plaintext: Improves Viktor's Death Ray and increases Ability Power

3200.name: The Hex Core
3200.description:
+3 Ability Power per level

(This item can be upgraded into one of three augments that enhance Viktor's basic abilities. Click the item in the store to discover its upgrades.)
3200.plaintext: Increases Ability Power and can be upgraded to improve Viktor's abilities

3211.name: Spectre's Cowl
3211.description:
+250 Health
+30 Magic Resist

UNIQUE Passive: Grants 15 Health Regen per 5 seconds for up to 10 seconds after taking damage from an enemy champion.
3211.plaintext: Improves defense and grants regeneration upon being damage

3222.name: Mikael's Crucible
3222.description:
+40 Magic Resist
+7 Health Regen per 5 seconds
+18 Mana Regen per 5 seconds

UNIQUE Passive - Mana Font: Increases Mana Regen by 1% for every 1% of missing Mana.
UNIQUE Active: Removes all stuns, roots, taunts, fears, silences, and slows on an allied champion and heals that champion for 150 (+10% of maximum Health) (180 second cooldown).

(Unique Passives with the same name do not stack.)
3222.plaintext: Activate to heal and remove all disabling effects from an allied champion
